content.json:
# Central Threat Intelligence - Indicator Management

This workbook helps security teams efficiently manage threat intelligence indicators for inoculating your M365 E3/E5 environment. It provides a streamlined workflow for reviewing, submitting, and distributing threat indicators to various security products.

> **Note:** This workbook requires Contributor permissions on the Log Analytics workspace to submit data.

content.query:
// Count of all active indicators by type
union 
(CTI_IPIndicators_CL
| where Active_b == true
| extend Type = "IP", Value = IPAddress_s),
(CTI_DomainIndicators_CL
| where Active_b == true
| extend Type = "Domain", Value = Domain_s),
(CTI_URLIndicators_CL
| where Active_b == true
| extend Type = "URL", Value = URL_s),
(CTI_FileHashIndicators_CL
| where Active_b == true
| extend Type = "File Hash", Value = coalesce(SHA256_s, SHA1_s, MD5_s)),
(CTI_ThreatIntelIndicator_CL 
| where Active_b == true
| extend Type = "Generic Indicator", Value = Value_s)
| summarize Count = count() by Type
| order by Count desc
content.title: Active Indicators by Type

content.query:
// Distribution of indicators by target product
union 
(CTI_IPIndicators_CL
| where Active_b == true
| extend Type = "IP", Value = IPAddress_s, Distribution = split(DistributionTargets_s, ", ")),
(CTI_DomainIndicators_CL
| where Active_b == true
| extend Type = "Domain", Value = Domain_s, Distribution = split(DistributionTargets_s, ", ")),
(CTI_URLIndicators_CL
| where Active_b == true
| extend Type = "URL", Value = URL_s, Distribution = split(DistributionTargets_s, ", ")),
(CTI_FileHashIndicators_CL
| where Active_b == true
| extend Type = "File Hash", Value = coalesce(SHA256_s, SHA1_s, MD5_s), Distribution = split(DistributionTargets_s, ", ")),
(CTI_ThreatIntelIndicator_CL 
| where Active_b == true
| extend Type = "Generic Indicator", Value = Value_s, Distribution = split(DistributionTargets_s, ", "))
| mv-expand Target = Distribution
| summarize Count = count() by tostring(Target), Type
| where isnotempty(Target)
| order by Count desc
content.title: Distribution by Target Product

content.query:
// Indicators by source feed
union 
(CTI_IPIndicators_CL
| where Active_b == true
| extend Type = "IP", Source = SourceFeed_s),
(CTI_DomainIndicators_CL
| where Active_b == true
| extend Type = "Domain", Source = SourceFeed_s),
(CTI_URLIndicators_CL
| where Active_b == true
| extend Type = "URL", Source = SourceFeed_s),
(CTI_FileHashIndicators_CL
| where Active_b == true
| extend Type = "File Hash", Source = SourceFeed_s),
(CTI_ThreatIntelIndicator_CL 
| where Active_b == true
| extend Type = "Generic Indicator", Source = Source_s)
| summarize Count = count() by Source
| where isnotempty(Source)
| order by Count desc
| take 10
content.title: Top 10 Source Feeds

content.query:
// Indicators added over time
union 
(CTI_IPIndicators_CL
| where Active_b == true
| extend Type = "IP", FirstSeen = FirstSeen_t),
(CTI_DomainIndicators_CL
| where Active_b == true
| extend Type = "Domain", FirstSeen = FirstSeen_t),
(CTI_URLIndicators_CL
| where Active_b == true
| extend Type = "URL", FirstSeen = FirstSeen_t),
(CTI_FileHashIndicators_CL
| where Active_b == true
| extend Type = "File Hash", FirstSeen = FirstSeen_t),
(CTI_ThreatIntelIndicator_CL 
| where Active_b == true
| extend Type = "Generic Indicator", FirstSeen = ValidFrom_t)
| summarize Count = count() by Type, bin(FirstSeen, 1d)
| order by FirstSeen asc
content.title: Indicator Growth Trend

content.query:
// Expiring indicators for the next 7 days
union 
(CTI_IPIndicators_CL
| where Active_b == true and ExpirationDateTime_t between (now() .. now()+7d)
| extend Type = "IP", Value = IPAddress_s, ExpirationDate = ExpirationDateTime_t),
(CTI_DomainIndicators_CL
| where Active_b == true and ExpirationDateTime_t between (now() .. now()+7d)
| extend Type = "Domain", Value = Domain_s, ExpirationDate = ExpirationDateTime_t),
(CTI_URLIndicators_CL
| where Active_b == true and ExpirationDateTime_t between (now() .. now()+7d)
| extend Type = "URL", Value = URL_s, ExpirationDate = ExpirationDateTime_t),
(CTI_FileHashIndicators_CL
| where Active_b == true and ExpirationDateTime_t between (now() .. now()+7d)
| extend Type = "File Hash", Value = coalesce(SHA256_s, SHA1_s, MD5_s), ExpirationDate = ExpirationDateTime_t),
(CTI_ThreatIntelIndicator_CL 
| where Active_b == true and ValidUntil_t between (now() .. now()+7d)
| extend Type = "Generic Indicator", Value = Value_s, ExpirationDate = ValidUntil_t)
| project Type, Value, ExpirationDate, ThreatType = coalesce(ThreatType_s, ""), Confidence = coalesce(Confidence_d, ConfidenceScore_d, 0), Source = coalesce(Source_s, SourceFeed_s, "")
| order by ExpirationDate asc
content.title: Indicators Expiring Soon (Next 7 Days)

parameters.name: MinConfidence
parameters.label: Min Confidence

parameters.name: IPAddress
parameters.label: IP Address
parameters.description: Enter the malicious IP address (IPv4 format)

parameters.name: IPAction
parameters.label: Action
parameters.description: Action to take when this indicator is matched

content.json:
### IP Submission Guidelines

- Enter the IP address in standard IPv4 format (e.g., 192.168.1.1)
- Confidence score should reflect your certainty (higher = more certain)
- Private IP addresses (10.x.x.x, 172.16-31.x.x, 192.168.x.x) will not be accepted
- TLP designation controls sharing permissions:
  - RED: No sharing outside organization
  - AMBER: Limited sharing within trusted community
  - GREEN: Community-wide sharing permitted
  - WHITE: Unlimited sharing
- Description should include context such as observed behaviors, campaigns, or threat actors

content.title: Validation

parameters.name: DomainAction
parameters.label: Action
parameters.description: Action to take when this indicator is matched

content.json:
### Domain Submission Guidelines

- Enter the domain name without http/https protocol (e.g., badsite.com)
- Confidence score should reflect your certainty (higher = more certain)
- For subdomains, include the entire FQDN (e.g., bad.example.com)
- TLP designation controls sharing permissions
- Description should include context such as observed behaviors, campaigns, or threat actors

content.title: Validation

parameters.name: URLAction
parameters.label: Action
parameters.description: Action to take when this indicator is matched

content.json:
### URL Submission Guidelines

- Enter the complete URL including protocol (http:// or https://)
- Include the full path for more specific blocking
- Confidence score should reflect your certainty (higher = more certain)
- Prioritize malicious URLs over domain submissions for more precise controls
- TLP designation controls sharing permissions
- Description should include context such as campaign ID, observed behaviors, or threat actors

content.title: Validation

parameters.name: MalwareFamily
parameters.label: Malware Family
parameters.description: Name of the malware family (if known)

parameters.name: HashAction
parameters.label: Action
parameters.description: Action to take when this indicator is matched

content.json:
### File Hash Submission Guidelines

- SHA256 is preferred for maximum compatibility with security tools
- Use correct hash format for the selected hash type:
  - SHA256: 64 hexadecimal characters
  - SHA1: 40 hexadecimal characters
  - MD5: 32 hexadecimal characters
- Malware Family helps with threat correlation and tracking
- File hashes typically have longer expiration periods than IPs or domains
- Add relevant details like file names or behavior in the description

content.title: Validation

content.query:
// Union all CTI indicator tables to show recent submissions
union 
(CTI_IPIndicators_CL
| where SourceFeed_s == "Manual" and TimeGenerated {RecentTimeRange}
| extend Type = "IP", Value = IPAddress_s
| project TimeGenerated, Type, Value, ThreatType = ThreatType_s, TLP = TLP_s, Confidence = ConfidenceScore_d),
(CTI_DomainIndicators_CL
| where SourceFeed_s == "Manual" and TimeGenerated {RecentTimeRange}
| extend Type = "Domain", Value = Domain_s
| project TimeGenerated, Type, Value, ThreatType = ThreatType_s, TLP = TLP_s, Confidence = ConfidenceScore_d),
(CTI_URLIndicators_CL
| where SourceFeed_s == "Manual" and TimeGenerated {RecentTimeRange}
| extend Type = "URL", Value = URL_s
| project TimeGenerated, Type, Value, ThreatType = ThreatType_s, TLP = TLP_s, Confidence = ConfidenceScore_d),
(CTI_FileHashIndicators_CL
| where SourceFeed_s == "Manual" and TimeGenerated {RecentTimeRange}
| extend Type = "FileHash", Value = coalesce(SHA256_s, SHA1_s, MD5_s)
| project TimeGenerated, Type, Value, ThreatType = ThreatType_s, TLP = TLP_s, Confidence = ConfidenceScore_d)
| order by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Recent Manual Submissions
content.noDataMessage: No manual submissions found in the selected time range

content.title: Submissions by Type
content.noDataMessage: No manual submissions found in the selected time range

content.title: Submission Trend

content.json:
# Distribution Management

This tab allows you to manage where threat intelligence indicators are distributed.

## Available Integration Points

| Security Product | Indicator Types Supported | Notes |
|-----------------|---------------------------|-------|
| Microsoft Defender XDR | IP, Domain, URL, File Hash | Uses Microsoft Graph Security API |
| Microsoft Sentinel | IP, Domain, URL, File Hash | Uses Threat Intelligence platform |
| Exchange Online | IP, Domain, URL, Email | Uses Exchange Online Protection |
| Microsoft Security Copilot | All Types | Requires proper licensing |
| Entra ID | IP addresses | Risky IP addresses only |

## Implementation Required

This tab is a placeholder for the distribution management functionality. In a complete implementation, this would allow you to:

1. Configure distribution targets for indicator types
2. Set confidence thresholds for automatic distribution
3. Manage API connections and credentials
4. View distribution status and failures

Please work with your CTI implementation team to complete this functionality.

parameters.name: StatusCategory
parameters.label: Status Category

content.query:
// Status summary for indicators
let expiryThreshold = now()+7d;
let recentThreshold = now()-7d;
let expiredThreshold = now()-30d;

// Define what indicators we need based on status category
let indicatorQuery = 
case(
    // Active indicators
    "{StatusCategory}" == "Active",
    union 
    (CTI_IPIndicators_CL
    | where Active_b == true
    | extend Type = "IP", Value = IPAddress_s, ExpDate = ExpirationDateTime_t, Added = coalesce(FirstSeen_t, TimeGenerated)),
    (CTI_DomainIndicators_CL
    | where Active_b == true
    | extend Type = "Domain", Value = Domain_s, ExpDate = ExpirationDateTime_t, Added = coalesce(FirstSeen_t, TimeGenerated)),
    (CTI_URLIndicators_CL
    | where Active_b == true
    | extend Type = "URL", Value = URL_s, ExpDate = ExpirationDateTime_t, Added = coalesce(FirstSeen_t, TimeGenerated)),
    (CTI_FileHashIndicators_CL
    | where Active_b == true
    | extend Type = "File Hash", Value = coalesce(SHA256_s, SHA1_s, MD5_s), ExpDate = ExpirationDateTime_t, Added = coalesce(FirstSeen_t, TimeGenerated)),
    // Expiring indicators
    "{StatusCategory}" == "Expiring",
    union 
    (CTI_IPIndicators_CL
    | where Active_b == true and ExpirationDateTime_t between (now() .. expiryThreshold)
    | extend Type = "IP", Value = IPAddress_s, ExpDate = ExpirationDateTime_t, Added = coalesce(FirstSeen_t, TimeGenerated)),
    (CTI_DomainIndicators_CL
    | where Active_b == true and ExpirationDateTime_t between (now() .. expiryThreshold)
    | extend Type = "Domain", Value = Domain_s, ExpDate = ExpirationDateTime_t, Added = coalesce(FirstSeen_t, TimeGenerated)),
    (CTI_URLIndicators_CL
    | where Active_b == true and ExpirationDateTime_t between (now() .. expiryThreshold)
    | extend Type = "URL", Value = URL_s, ExpDate = ExpirationDateTime_t, Added = coalesce(FirstSeen_t, TimeGenerated)),
    (CTI_FileHashIndicators_CL
    | where Active_b == true and ExpirationDateTime_t between (now() .. expiryThreshold)
    | extend Type = "File Hash", Value = coalesce(SHA256_s, SHA1_s, MD5_s), ExpDate = ExpirationDateTime_t, Added = coalesce(FirstSeen_t, TimeGenerated)),
    // Expired indicators
    "{StatusCategory}" == "Expired",
    union 
    (CTI_IPIndicators_CL
    | where (Active_b == false or ExpirationDateTime_t < now()) and ExpirationDateTime_t between (expiredThreshold .. now())
    | extend Type = "IP", Value = IPAddress_s, ExpDate = ExpirationDateTime_t, Added = coalesce(FirstSeen_t, TimeGenerated)),
    (CTI_DomainIndicators_CL
    | where (Active_b == false or ExpirationDateTime_t < now()) and ExpirationDateTime_t between (expiredThreshold .. now())
    | extend Type = "Domain", Value = Domain_s, ExpDate = ExpirationDateTime_t, Added = coalesce(FirstSeen_t, TimeGenerated)),
    (CTI_URLIndicators_CL
    | where (Active_b == false or ExpirationDateTime_t < now()) and ExpirationDateTime_t between (expiredThreshold .. now())
    | extend Type = "URL", Value = URL_s, ExpDate = ExpirationDateTime_t, Added = coalesce(FirstSeen_t, TimeGenerated)),
    (CTI_FileHashIndicators_CL
    | where (Active_b == false or ExpirationDateTime_t < now()) and ExpirationDateTime_t between (expiredThreshold .. now())
    | extend Type = "File Hash", Value = coalesce(SHA256_s, SHA1_s, MD5_s), ExpDate = ExpirationDateTime_t, Added = coalesce(FirstSeen_t, TimeGenerated)),
    // Recently added indicators
    "{StatusCategory}" == "Recent",
    union 
    (CTI_IPIndicators_CL
    | where coalesce(FirstSeen_t, TimeGenerated) > recentThreshold
    | extend Type = "IP", Value = IPAddress_s, ExpDate = ExpirationDateTime_t, Added = coalesce(FirstSeen_t, TimeGenerated)),
    (CTI_DomainIndicators_CL
    | where coalesce(FirstSeen_t, TimeGenerated) > recentThreshold
    | extend Type = "Domain", Value = Domain_s, ExpDate = ExpirationDateTime_t, Added = coalesce(FirstSeen_t, TimeGenerated)),
    (CTI_URLIndicators_CL
    | where coalesce(FirstSeen_t, TimeGenerated) > recentThreshold
    | extend Type = "URL", Value = URL_s, ExpDate = ExpirationDateTime_t, Added = coalesce(FirstSeen_t, TimeGenerated)),
    (CTI_FileHashIndicators_CL
    | where coalesce(FirstSeen_t, TimeGenerated) > recentThreshold
    | extend Type = "File Hash", Value = coalesce(SHA256_s, SHA1_s, MD5_s), ExpDate = ExpirationDateTime_t, Added = coalesce(FirstSeen_t, TimeGenerated)),
    // Default - empty result
    (print Type = ""| where 1 == 0)
);

// Apply type filter if applicable
let typeFilteredQuery = 
case(
    "{FilterType}" == "All", indicatorQuery,
    indicatorQuery | where Type == "{FilterType}"
);

// Get final result
typeFilteredQuery
| project Type, Value, ExpDate, Added, 
         ThreatType = coalesce(ThreatType_s, ""), 
         Confidence = coalesce(ConfidenceScore_d, Confidence_d, 0),
         Source = coalesce(SourceFeed_s, Source_s, "")
| order by ExpDate asc
content.title: {StatusCategory} Indicators - {FilterType}
content.noDataMessage: No indicators found in this category

content.query:
// Status summary for indicators
let expiryThreshold = now()+7d;
let recentThreshold = now()-7d;
let expiredThreshold = now()-30d;

// Get counts for different statuses
union 
// Active indicators
(union 
    (CTI_IPIndicators_CL
    | where Active_b == true
    | extend Type = "IP"),
    (CTI_DomainIndicators_CL
    | where Active_b == true
    | extend Type = "Domain"),
    (CTI_URLIndicators_CL
    | where Active_b == true
    | extend Type = "URL"),
    (CTI_FileHashIndicators_CL
    | where Active_b == true
    | extend Type = "File Hash")
| summarize ActiveCount = count() by Type),
// Expiring indicators
(union 
    (CTI_IPIndicators_CL
    | where Active_b == true and ExpirationDateTime_t between (now() .. expiryThreshold)
    | extend Type = "IP"),
    (CTI_DomainIndicators_CL
    | where Active_b == true and ExpirationDateTime_t between (now() .. expiryThreshold)
    | extend Type = "Domain"),
    (CTI_URLIndicators_CL
    | where Active_b == true and ExpirationDateTime_t between (now() .. expiryThreshold)
    | extend Type = "URL"),
    (CTI_FileHashIndicators_CL
    | where Active_b == true and ExpirationDateTime_t between (now() .. expiryThreshold)
    | extend Type = "File Hash")
| summarize ExpiringCount = count() by Type),
// Expired indicators
(union 
    (CTI_IPIndicators_CL
    | where (Active_b == false or ExpirationDateTime_t < now()) and ExpirationDateTime_t between (expiredThreshold .. now())
    | extend Type = "IP"),
    (CTI_DomainIndicators_CL
    | where (Active_b == false or ExpirationDateTime_t < now()) and ExpirationDateTime_t between (expiredThreshold .. now())
    | extend Type = "Domain"),
    (CTI_URLIndicators_CL
    | where (Active_b == false or ExpirationDateTime_t < now()) and ExpirationDateTime_t between (expiredThreshold .. now())
    | extend Type = "URL"),
    (CTI_FileHashIndicators_CL
    | where (Active_b == false or ExpirationDateTime_t < now()) and ExpirationDateTime_t between (expiredThreshold .. now())
    | extend Type = "File Hash")
| summarize ExpiredCount = count() by Type),
// Recently added indicators
(union 
    (CTI_IPIndicators_CL
    | where coalesce(FirstSeen_t, TimeGenerated) > recentThreshold
    | extend Type = "IP"),
    (CTI_DomainIndicators_CL
    | where coalesce(FirstSeen_t, TimeGenerated) > recentThreshold
    | extend Type = "Domain"),
    (CTI_URLIndicators_CL
    | where coalesce(FirstSeen_t, TimeGenerated) > recentThreshold
    | extend Type = "URL"),
    (CTI_FileHashIndicators_CL
    | where coalesce(FirstSeen_t, TimeGenerated) > recentThreshold
    | extend Type = "File Hash")
| summarize RecentCount = count() by Type)
| summarize Active = sum(ActiveCount), Expiring = sum(ExpiringCount), Expired = sum(ExpiredCount), RecentlyAdded = sum(RecentCount) by Type
content.title: Indicator Status Summary

content.json:
## Implementation Instructions

### Deployment Steps

1. **Save this workbook** in your Microsoft Sentinel workspace associated with your CTI solution
2. **Grant permissions** to users who need to submit indicators:
   - Users need `Microsoft Sentinel Contributor` role on the Log Analytics workspace
   - Or create a custom role with `microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces/write` permission

### Data Function Implementation

For production use, you'll need to implement the actual data submission. Replace the "DataToBeInserted" visualizations with function calls like:

```kql
_Data_PutBlob("CTI_IPIndicators_CL", 
  dynamic({
    "IPAddress_s": "{IPAddress}", 
    "IndicatorId_g": guid(), 
    "ConfidenceScore_d": {IPConfidenceScore}, 
    "SourceFeed_s": "{SourceFeed}", 
    "FirstSeen_t": now(), 
    "LastSeen_t": now(), 
    "ExpirationDateTime_t": now() + {IPExpirationDays}d, 
    "ThreatType_s": "{IPThreatType}", 
    "TLP_s": "{IPTLP}", 
    "Description_s": "{IPDescription}", 
    "Action_s": "{IPAction}", 
    "DistributionTargets_s": "{Distribution}", 
    "Active_b": true
  })
)
```

### Additional Features to Consider

- **Bulk Upload**: Add CSV import functionality for batch submissions
- **MITRE ATT&CK Mapping**: Add fields to associate indicators with MITRE tactics and techniques
- **Cross-Table Correlation**: Add the ability to link related indicators
- **Approval Workflow**: Implement an approval step for submitted indicators
- **Custom Field Extension**: Add organization-specific fields
